name: centum
description:
A turn-based roguelike in 100 floors. Find the Amulet of Zot and escape on floor 100!

Controls:

Arrow keys to move up/left/down/right. You can also use WASD!

Pick up or swap items with G.

Wait one turn with period key.

Use active items with the 1-6 keys.

Click on a monster or item to reveal more information about it.

Tips:

Click on a monster or item to reveal more information about it.

Rest points occur every ten floors, where you can spend your gold for items.

This is a turn-based game. Enemies don't move until after you do.

You gain additional item slots every 4 levels, up to 6 slots.

Quaffing potions while currently under their effects will impart a small but permeant bonus to your character.

Staying too long on a level will cause shadow monsters to spawn, denoted by their purple spawning animation. These monsters do not give experience!

Taking shortcuts let you dive depths faster without increasing difficulty as quickly.

Press M to enter exploration mode. During this mode, you recover to full health after death, however you will be unable to submit your score.

This game is hard. Good luck.
